Translations.Text: velekad kerramna beni ademe vehamelnahum fi-lberri velbahri verazaknahum mine-ttayyibati vefeddalnahum `ala kesirim mimmen halakna tefdila
yevme ned`u kulle unasim biimamihim. femen utiye kitabehu biyeminihi feulaike yakraune kitabehum vela yuzlemune fetila
vemen kane fi hazihi a`ma fehuve fi-l'ahirati a`ma veedallu sebila
vein kadu leyeftinuneke `ani-llezi evhayna ileyke litefteriye `aleyna gayrah. veizel lettehazuke halila
velevla en sebbetnake lekad kitte terkenu ileyhim sey'en kalila
izel leezaknake di`fe-lhayati vedi`fe-lmemati summe la tecidu leke `aleyna nesira
vein kadu leyestefizzuneke mine-l'ardi liyuhricuke minha veizel la yelbesune hilafeke illa kalila
sunnete men kad erselna kableke mir rusulina vela tecidu lisunnetina tahvila
ekimi-ssalate liduluki-ssemsi ila gaseki-lleyli vekur'ane-lfecr. inne kur'ane-lfecri kane meshuda
vemine-lleyli fetehecced bihi nafiletel lek. `asa ey yeb`aseke rabbuke mekamem mahmuda
vekur rabbi edhilni mudhale sidkiv veahricni muhrace sidkiv vec`al li mil ledunke sultanen nesira
vekul cae-lhakku vezeheka-lbatil. inne-lbatile kane zehuka
venunezzilu mine-lkur'ani ma huve sifauv verahmetul lilmu'minine vela yezidu-zzalimine illa hasara
veiza en`amna `ale-l'insani a`rada venea bicanibih. veiza messehu-sserru kane yeusa
kul kulluy ya`melu `ala sakiletih. ferabbukum a`lemu bimen huve ehda sebila
veyes'eluneke `ani-rruh. kuli-rruhu min emri rabbi vema utitum mine-l`ilmi illa kalila
velein si'na lenezhebenne billezi evhayna ileyke summe la tecidu leke bihi `aleyna vekila
illa rahmetem mir rabbik. inne fadlehu kane `aleyke kebira
kul leini-cteme`ati-l'insu velcinnu `ala ey ye'tu bimisli haze-lkur'ani la ye'tune bimislihi velev kane ba`duhum liba`din zahira
velekad sarrafna linnasi fi haze-lkur'ani min kulli mesel. feeba ekseru-nnasi illa kufura
vekalu len nu'mine leke hatta tefcura lena mine-l'ardi yembu`a
ev tekune leke cennetum min nehiliv ve`inebin fetufeccira-l'enhara hilaleha tefcira
ev tuskita-ssemae kema za`amte `aleyna kisefen ev te'tiye billahi velmelaiketi kabila
ev yekune leke beytum min zuhrufin ev terka fi-ssema'. velen nu'mine lirukiyyike hatta tunezzile `aleyna kitaben nakrauh. kul subhane rabbi hel kuntu illa beserar rasula
vema mene`a-nnase ey yu'minu iz caehumu-lhuda illa en kalu ebe`ase-llahu beserar rasula
kul lev kane fi-l'ardi melaiketuy yemsune mutmeinnine lenezzelna `aleyhim mine-ssemai meleker rasula
kul kefa billahi sehidem beyni vebeynekum. innehu kane bi`ibadihi habiram besira

vemey yehdi-llahu fehuve-lmuhted. vemey yudlil felen tecide lehum evliyae min dunih. venahsuruhum yevme-lkiyameti `ala vucuhihim `umyev vebukmev vesumma. me'vahum cehennem. kullema habet zidnahum se`ira
zalike cezauhum biennehum keferu biayatina vekalu eiza kunna `izamev verufaten einna lemeb`usune halkan cedida
